scripts.nuke: yarn nuke:packages && yarn nuke:apps && yarn nuke:features && yarn nuke:lockfile
scripts.nuke:packages: rm -r node_modules; for d in packages/*/*/node_modules; do echo $d; rm -r $d; done
scripts.nuke:apps: rm -r node_modules; for d in apps/*/node_modules; do echo $d; rm -r $d; done
scripts.nuke:lockfile: for d in ./*.lock; do echo $d; rm -rf $d; done
scripts.nuke:dist: rm -r dist; for d in packages/*/dist; do echo $d; rm -r $d; done
